body.name: Cora Organic Applicator Tampons | Super Plus Absorbency | 100% Organic Cotton, Unscented, Plant-Based Compact Applicator | Leak Protection, Easy Insertion, Non-Toxic (36 Tampons)
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 15% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 20 mins
features: NEW & IMPROVED: The best-selling organic cotton tampon on Amazon, now even better than ever! Made from 100% organic cotton with a new plant-based applicator and an updated design that expands widthwise for ultra confident leak protection. Packaging may vary.

100% ORGANIC COTTON: Tampons made from 100% certified organic cotton – because what you put in your body matters. Made without pesticides, dioxins, rayon, or chlorine; free of fragrance and dyes. FSA/HSA Eligible.
NEW PLANT-BASED APPLICATOR: Sleek, plant-based* compact applicator made from renewable resources for smooth, comfortable insertion. *minimum 92% plant-based plastic

EXPANDS AND PROTECTS: Gently expands to absorb from all angles for a worry-free, comfortable fit and ultra reliable leak protection –so you can roll with your flow. All absorbencies available for light to heavy flows: Light, Regular, Super, Super Plus, and Variety Packs.

EVERY BODY DESERVES COMFORT: We believe everyone should have access to period care–full stop. So, with each Cora purchase, we provide period products and body literacy resources to people who might otherwise go without.
100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: If you are not 100% delighted by our goods, reach out to us and we’ll make it right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to make the transition to pure organic cotton products and found this brand in store. Absolutely love it! I order super plus through Amazon cause I can also subscribe and get them automatically delivered to my house. Only thing, sometimes they come without any wrapping or outside packaging. If you don't mind your business possibly seen by others, get thus product asap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural feminine product
reviews.reviewText: I find comfort in knowing that this product is made bleach free and organic. They are comfortable and easy to deal with the packaging is cute too, discreet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable and absorbent. Love that they’re organic and eco-friendly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dupe/replacement for Kotex U
reviews.reviewText: I have extremely heavy periods and the only tampon that has ever worked for me are the Kotex U, which has been discontinued. I've been buying different brands all year, testing and trying them out. I'm also plus sized and I can't use Tampax, et al, because they applicator is so small and has no lip or grip. I can't contort myself into a pretzel to try and inset a tampon. If you're bleeding heavily, the applicator gets wet and makes it almost impossible to push those in or take them out.I tried the Lola brand sold here on Amazon and they were about as close as I could find but were packed so tightly that they didn't absorb much. When you take them out, you basically do a Kill Bill across the bathroom floor with a big glop of blood everywhere, because it's more of a plug than an absorbent tampon. They also hurt because they were packed like bricks. My vag felt like it had a headache all the time, lol.These, however, are about 99% there. Good absorbency and comfortable to insert. They're soft so they absorb the blood. And most importantly, they have the wide-bottomed applicator that has a lip on the edge so you can grip it if things are slippery.My only complaint is that the bottom applicator tends to separate from the top piece. The great thing about Kotek U was that when you inserted the bottom and pushed it through, there was a little dot that clicked them together so when you pulled it out they came out together with no problem. I find I have to dig a little to make sure I'm pulling both pieces out at the same time. But other than that, they are a fantastic replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They don’t seem to expand as much as they could to get the full absorption however I do continue to purchase and use when I can’t use my cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as absorbent as others are saying
reviews.reviewText: So, I’ve been searching for a clean brand tampon that is also extremely absorbent. This is not it. I am a heavy bleeding girlie during the first 3 days of my period so I need a tampon that can hold me through at least 2 hours without bleeding through.I’ve always used Tampax ultra. Those are THEE JAM!!! Those ultra’s carried me through 4 hours at at time without a leak.BUT, I can’t use them anymore because I read they are toxic and can cause cancer and all that blah blah so I’m trying so hard to be better to my body and the environment.I’ve bought Lola, I’ve bought organic brand, I’ve bough rael, and now Cora.also, TMI but when um inserting the tampon, i seem ti always get my labia pinched with the applicator. OUCH.So far, cora is the best so far out of that list but I still have to wear a pad together with the tampon at work for obvious reasons. I wish wish wish I can find the winner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The alternative we needed.
reviews.reviewText: We all know why we’re here. Kotex discontinued our tried and true tampons.I’ll get to the point. Are these better than Kotex? No. Are they at least comparable or better than the other alternatives? Yes. The applicator is trash. BUT, if you figure out how to hold it a certain way it’s not impossible.I have put these tampons through crazy crossfit workouts with zero leaks, and no slippage or any other crazy problems. No bits and pieces coming off while taking the tampon out. Nothing like that.Again. They are not Kotex, they are not better than Kotex. Ladies I don’t think we’re ever getting another security tampon. These will definitely do though.
